text: Glorious leader, it seems our excavation hasn't gone unnoticed, the diggers have disturbed some long-forgotten prince and now the dead rise up to ensure his peace.
My most glorious leader, an excavation has uncovered a great tomb with many riches, should we begin securing the treasures?

A Norscan throng pillages through Nehekhara, while a norscan this far south is rare, rumour has it this one is all too familiar with the lands and is here to enact revenge for his fallen master Valgar the Butcher.
Our archaeological dig has been hampered by Ratmen attacks, peculiarly it seems these rats are actually trying to defend the Nehekharan Tombs.
Disgusting Tilean's mean to plunder the lost Nehekharan wonders for their own personal gain and see us as nothing more than a barbarian obstacle.
Elves draped in dark clothing have been spotted nearby, no doubt seeking powerful Nehekharan items for their own ruinous power.
We have stumbled across some hideous ritual involving blood, entrails and pentagrams but that seems to the least of our problem. We think whatever they were trying to do might have actually worked.
